content: to be reproduced for resale items made from pattern can be sold for profit with prior written permission from designer for questions or comments please send an email to niseyknits@gmail com i used the clover pompom maker to make my pompoms so i ve included this video tutorial by knitpicks on how to make your own pompom using that same tool it s also pretty easy to make a pompom without using a special tool so i ve included a video tutorial by bernat yarns on how to make a pompom without a pompom maker ©niseyknits 2020 pattern for personal and charity use only pattern not to be reproduced for resale items made from pattern can be sold for profit with prior written 5 permission from designer for questions or comments please send an email to niseyknits@gmail com photography by nkadu photography
